extends java.lang.Object

      int GetWidth() 
      void Invert() 
      void MulAlpha()
      when display Bitmap object, adjust color value as: R = R * alpha / 255; G = G * alpha / 255; B = B * alpha / 255; for Bitmap all alpha is 0 or all alpha is 255, this method can be ignored to invoke.

    • Method Detail

      • Create

        public final void Create(Bitmap bmp)
        create BMP object for native using.
        Parameters:
        bmp - format can be ARGB_8888/ARGB_4444/RGB_565

      • DrawToDIB

        public final void DrawToDIB(DIB dib,
             int x,
             int y)

      • DrawRect

        public final void DrawRect(int color,
            int x,
            int y,
            int width,
            int height,
            int mode)
        fill solid rectangle to bmp.
        Parameters:
        color - the color to fill, formatted: 0xAARRGGBB, AA: alpha value.
        x -
        y -
        width -
        height -
        mode -
        0: mix color by source pixels with alpha channel.
        1: replace pixels.

      • MulAlpha

        public final void MulAlpha()
        when display Bitmap object, adjust color value as: R = R * alpha / 255; G = G * alpha / 255; B = B * alpha / 255; for Bitmap all alpha is 0 or all alpha is 255, this method can be ignored to invoke.

      • Invert

        public final void Invert()

      • Free

        public final void Free(Bitmap bmp)

      • GetWidth

        public final int GetWidth()

      • GetHeight

        public final int GetHeight()

      • SavePixs

        public final boolean SavePixs(java.lang.String path)
        save pixels data to file.
        Parameters:
        path - path-name to the file.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • RestorePixs

        public final boolean RestorePixs(java.lang.String path)
        restore pixels data from file
        Parameters:
        path - path-name to the file
        Returns:
        true or false. width, height, and pixels format of bitmap must match to Bitmap object, otherwise return false.
